component.name: SuperInstall
component.summary: The ultimate universal installer for Linux (.deb, AppImage, Flatpak, Snap)
El instalador universal definitivo para Linux (.deb, AppImage, Flatpak, Snap)

description.p: SuperInstall is a modern package manager that simplifies the installation and management of various Linux formats. With a sleek Midnight-themed interface, it allows you to drag and drop files for instant installation.

SuperInstall es un gestor de paquetes moderno que simplifica la instalación y gestión de varios formatos de Linux. Con una elegante interfaz temática Midnight, te permite arrastrar y soltar archivos para una instalación instantánea.

ul.li: Support for .deb, AppImage, Flatpak, and Snap.
Integrated application manager to list and uninstall software.
